title: Pork Fillet with Olives, Tomatoes and Rosemary
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 (340g) pork fillets', '2 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '4 tablespoons chopped green olives', '4 tablespoons dry white wine', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '125ml double cream']
